actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-38.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1983) to amend certain housing and community development laws to provide emergency mortgage assistance to homeowners and emergency shelter for the homeless.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 1983 (housing and community development).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1983) to amend certain housing and community development laws to provide emergency mortgage assistance to homeowners and emergency shelter for the homeless.
